DOC.brief_summary: The CARD study observational study include Chinese adolescent diabetes age 18-30 . The study aim explore status disease treatment , self-management , relationship disease treatment disease outcome Chinese adolescent diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Chinese Adolescent Registry Diabetes ( CARD ) Study
DOC.criteria: diagnose diabetes age 1430 sign inform consent take part drug research gestational diabetes diagnose tumor cardiovascular disease
